sqlMap.insert: insert into board (boardNum, boardTitle, boardContent,boardKindNum, boardCount, boardDate, memNum) values (seq_board.nextval, #boardTitle#, #boardContent#, 3,0,sysdate, #memNum#)
sqlMap.select: select board.*, ROWNUM as boardGroupNum from board where boardKindNum = 3

select BOARDNUM, BOARDTITLE, BOARDCONTENT, TO_CHAR(BOARDDATE2,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BOARDDATE2, BOARDCOUNT, BOARDKINDNUM, MEMNUM, ROW_NUMBER() over(order by boardNum)as boardGroupNum from board
where boardTitle LIKE '%'||#data#||'%' and boardKindNum = 3 order by BoardNum DESC
sqlMap.update: update board set boardTitle=#boardTitle#, boardContent=#boardContent# where boardNum=#boardNum#
update board set boardCount = #boardCount# + 1 where boardNum=#boardNum#
